advisory.name: RLBA-2021:1943
advisory.synopsis: crash-trace-command bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for crash-trace-command is now available for Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation EnterpriseLinux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.4 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: [RHEL-8.4] crash-trace-command: fails to load trace.so that '/usr/lib64/crash/extensions/trace.so: no commands registered: shared object unloaded '
